title: About trace_replayBlockTransactions, anxious
body:
### System information
> erigon version 2.38.1-stable
### Command
> ./build/bin/erigon --datadir=/data1/ethereum/ethereum/.erigon --chain=mainnet --http --http.port=8454 --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --http.api eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon,txpool --ws --externalcl --vmdebug --snap.keepblocks --authrpc.port=8551 --authrpc.addr 0.0.0.0 --authrpc.vhosts localhost --authrpc.jwtsecret /data1/ethereum/ethereum/consensus/prysm/jwt.hex
### Running state
[logs_1.txt](https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/files/10788715/logs_1.txt)
### Example
> curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data '{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "trace_replayBlockTransactions", "params": ["0xccb93d",["trace"]], "id":1}' http://127.0.0.1:8454
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":1,"error":{"code":-32000,"message":"first run for txIndex 0 error: nonce too high: address 0xa06C3c08A19e51B33309edDFb356c33EAD8517A3, tx: 964 state: 0"}}
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0xf978486bed72890591704ce0fe9d802d88b8f74a576b0e3593acfea89151b337"],"id":1}' http://127.0.0.1:8454
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":1,"result":{"blockHash":"0x418f2951570ed218a5bc8dbc1886fd4ab189be6a87329dd12efea28bf6962cf7","blockNumber":"0xaa162b","contractAddress":null,"cumulativeGasUsed":"0xbd2d1c","effectiveGasPrice":"0xab5d04c00","from":"0x158aed9f2e8231c8f44fd43b7a9ff1ab6e897937","gasUsed":"0x6661","logs":[{"address":"0xdac17f958d2ee523a2206206994597c13d831ec7","topics":["0xddf252ad1be2c89b69c2b068fc378daa952ba7f163c4a11628f55a4df523b3ef","0x000000000000000000000000158aed9f2e8231c8f44fd43b7a9ff1ab6e897937","0x00000000000000000000000096fd96ce6f736666b5e453c48cc97d5643358285"],"data":"0x000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000002376fac0","blockNumber":"0xaa162b","transactionHash":"0xf978486bed72890591704ce0fe9d802d88b8f74a576b0e3593acfea89151b337","transactionIndex":"0xb2","blockHash":"0x418f2951570ed218a5bc8dbc1886fd4ab189be6a87329dd12efea28bf6962cf7","logIndex":"0x10c","removed":false}],"logsBloom":"","status":"0x1","to":"0xdac17f958d2ee523a2206206994597c13d831ec7","transactionHash":"0xf978486bed72890591704ce0fe9d802d88b8f74a576b0e3593acfea89151b337","transactionIndex":"0xb2","type":"0x0"}}
### Question
> The eth function is normal, but the trace function cannot be used. I want to know why.
The log shows that the erigon is in  "[7/15 Execution] Executed blocks         number=12759224 blk/s=9.8 tx/s=1588.6 Mgas/s=142.7"
Does it mean that erigon still has 8 steps to complete? Do I need to wait until all steps are completed before using trace? Or other?
### Thanks
I've been stuck with this problem for days and I want to know the answer. Thanks!
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
This issue was closed because it has been stalled for 7 days with no activity.
